title: My NEW Gaming PC Build - AMD Ryzen 9 5950X & Radeon RX 6800 XT
description: Get a Free 32GB Flash Drive and 32GB Micro SD Card:  Get the best prices and best selection at Micro Center:  Micro Center Custom PC Builder:  AMD Radeon RX 6800 Benchmarks:    AMD Ryzen 9 5950X:  ASRock X570M PRO4 mATX Motherboard:  Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-4000 PC4-32000 CL18:  Samsung 980 PRO Series 500GB SSD:  EVGA SuperNOVA 850 Watt 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply:  Corsair Crystal 280X Computer Case:  Corsair iCUE H100i ELITE CAPELLIX 240mm RGB Water Cooling Kit:  Corsair LL120 RGB Hydraulic Bearing 120mm Case Fan:  PowerColor Graphics Cards:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
